os.fullpath: Operating System :: Handheld/Embedded Operating Systems :: Android

name: わすらもち (for Android)
summary: "百人一首" player specialized to "競技かるた" : for Android
short_description:
"わすらもち (Wasuramoti)" is a Hyakunin-Isshu (*1) audio player specialized for training Kyogi-Karuta (*2).
This Android application plays 100 poems randomly or in shuffled order.

This site is just for distributing source code and .apk file.
In order to install "わすらもち", it is convenient using Google Play ( https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=karuta.hpnpwd.wasuramoti )

(*1) "百人一首 (Hyakunin-Issshu)" is most famous set of Japanese poem.
(*2) "競技かるた (Competitive Karuta)" is a Japanese sport which uses the set.
